sentences.en: A little lizard scuttled across the path.
sentences.cn: 一条小蜥蜴急急地从路上爬过。

sentences.en: Ariel: I gotta see him again, tonight! Scuttle knows where he lives.
sentences.cn: 爱丽尔: 我得再去见见他, 今晚就去! 斯卡托知道他住在哪儿.

sentences.en: Ariel: Scuttle, be quiet! They'll hear you.
sentences.cn: 爱丽尔: 斯卡托, 安静点! 他们会听到的.

sentences.en: Ariel: Uh, I'm sorry, I've gotta go. Thank you, Scuttle.
sentences.cn: 爱丽尔: 啊, 对不起, 我得走了. 谢谢你, 斯卡托!

sentences.en: But if they scuttle Mr Obama's nominee, he will simply name another.
sentences.cn: 但如果他们把奥巴马的候选名单刷下, 那奥巴马只是简单地换名字就可以了.

sentences.en: Crabs scuttle along the muddy bank.
sentences.cn: 几只螃蟹沿着泥泞的河堤快速横行。

sentences.en: He personally had received orders from Commander Lehmann to scuttle the ship.
sentences.cn: 他个人已收到莱曼司令要求凿沉轮船的命令。

sentences.en: I saw him scuttle across the street.
sentences.cn: 这个罪犯看见警察快过来了,急匆匆地跑过了河.

sentences.en: Scuttle: Maybe you could make a little planter out of it or something.
sentences.cn: 斯卡托: 也许你可以用它来种点花草什么的.

sentences.en: Scuttle: Right, as if you two didn't know, uh ?
sentences.cn: 斯卡托: 好像你们两个还不知道, 是 吧 ?

sentences.en: Several conscripts were seen to scuttle off barracks.
sentences.cn: 有人看见几个新兵从兵营里逃走了.

sentences.en: Such threats could scuttle the peace conference.
sentences.cn: 这种威胁会阻挠和平会议。

sentences.en: The children scuttle across the street.
sentences.cn: 我看见他急匆匆地穿街而过.

sentences.en: The scuttle was open, and the good daylight shone in.
sentences.cn: 明朗的亮光从敞开的小窗中照了进来。

sentences.en: There was a general scuttle for shelter when the rain began to fall heavily.
sentences.cn: 下大雨了,人们都飞跑着寻找躲雨的地方.

sentences.en: With the right spell, you can scuttle your boats to prevent your enemies from using them.
sentences.cn: 使用合适的魔法, 你可以摧毁你的船只以防被敌方利用.

trans.tran_cn: 天窗, 舱室小孔, 煤桶, 急速逃走

trans.tran_en: to sink a ship by making holes in the bottom, especially in order to prevent it being used by an enemy

trans.tran_cn: 快跑，急走，逃避，急忙撤退
破坏（计划），毁坏，（在船底凿孔）使船沉没，凿沉
